
### locality exercise (1)  {.smaller}

<!-- \lstset{language=C,style=small} -->
 
```
/* version 1 */
for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
    for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j)
        A[i] += B[j] * C[i * N + j]

/* version 2 */
for (int j = 0; j < N; ++j)
    for (int i = 0; i < N; ++i)
        A[i] += B[j] * C[i * N + j];

```
 exercise: which has better temporal locality in A? in B? in C? <br> how about spatial locality?
